sense.def:
To dig
pomeni zasajati lopato v zemljo in z njo razkopati tla ali narediti jamo.

seg.quote: He dug a little hole in the ground.

sense.def:
To dig one thing into another
pomeni čvrsto potisniti eno stvar v drugo.

seg.quote: She dug her needle into her sewing.

sense.def:
A dig
je pripomba, s katero želimo nekoga prizadeti ali spraviti v zadrego.

seg.quote: Whenever she can, she takes a dig at me.

sense.def:
To dig something out
pomeni nekaj najti, potem ko je bilo dolgo skrito ali spravljeno.

seg.quote: We dug out our tour books and maps for the holiday.

sense.def:
To dig up information
pomeni odkriti podatke, ki niso splošno znani.

seg.quote: Journalists have dug up some hair-raising facts about the company.
